price: 163. Ocuparán diferentes niveles ante Al-lah (tanto en el Paraíso como en el Infierno). Y Al-lah ve todo lo que hacen.
arabic: هُمۡ دَرَجَٰتٌ عِندَ ٱللَّهِۗ وَٱللَّهُ بَصِيرُۢ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: hum darajātun ʿinda al-lahi wal-lahu baṣīrun bimā yaʿmalūna
